Boston.Downtown Crossing station: Downtown Crossing station is a rapid transit station located in Boston, Massachusetts. It is located in the Downtown Crossing retail district in downtown Boston. It is the junction of the Massachusetts Bay Transportation Authority (MBTA)'s Orange and Red Lines, and is one of four "hub stations" on the MBTA Subway system, as well as a major bus transfer location serving 13 MBTA Bus routes, including one Silver Line route.
